name: LimboBreak
description:
You are Luna, a young witch who was unfairly killed during the witch-hunt. You are now stuck in limbo, which seems to be some sort of confinement prison. 

All the gates are closing. If they do, you're stuck here for all eternity.

Luckily, You managed to bring your favorite enchanted wand with you before you died. They are your only means to escape.

Controls

WASD - To move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Use your wand

Right Mouse Button - Use your wand in spread mode

If you're ever stuck , or just want a quick restart, press "R" and it will reset the level.

Credits-

All sprites and code were made by myself.

All Music was made by Abstraction:

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Songs used were VGMA Challenge - July 6th and VGMA Challenge - July 31st.

Sound Effects:

http://soundbible.com/1531-Temple-Bell.html, http://soundbible.com/1506-Temple-Bell-Huge.html

Any and all feedback are appreciated! Also please let me know if everything is running smoothly.

Thank you very much!
